post.author: kat
post.body:
Post ONLY tutorials that are specific to Quake 4 editing in here.

Do NOT post tutorial requests in here.

When posting tutorial topics in this forum section please use 'Tutorial' as the 1st work in the topic header and capitalise it - 'TUTORIAL' - this ensures that all the tutorials are easy to spot at a glance.

post.author: goliathvt
post.body:
Quake 4 Video Tutorial - Update

The FX Editor

Grab it here:
http://files.filefront.com/Q4_FX_Ed_Vid ... einfo.html

Link updated: No new content, but I fixed a few things and split the video into parts to fix the video/audio sync issues.

---

This tutorial video will provide an introduction to
the Quake 4 FX editor.

Runtime: 48 minutes 13 seconds

The video was encoded with the xvid codec, which can
be found here:
http://divx-digest.com/software/xvid.html

Enjoy!

Goliath

post.author: goliathvt
post.body:
Quake 4 Maps and Mod Directory Structure Walkthrough

http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewto ... 841#117841

This will also work for Doom3, of course, but I wanted to link it here so we can have less confusion over directory structure issues.

Goliath

post.author: Enforcer
post.body:
Filtering Arena CTF items

A little Clarification on my part - This tutorial will show you how to hide the mapobject, func_fx for ctf or other gamestypes and load them for arenaCTF.

post.author: Steveo
post.body:
This is a tutorial to show you how to get a working map loading bar for your custom quake 4 map. This is my first tutorial I have ever made so it may be hard for some to follow, but if you read it carefully you should get it ok.

Please note that this tutorial was written in html and only works with internet explorer.

you can download it right here:
http://steveoschamber.d3files.com/system/downloads/tut_q4_ldbar.zip
